pullRequest.title: [TE] Upgrade Pinot version to 0.4.0
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Upgrade Pinot version to 0.4.0
Starting 0.4.0, Pinot schemas can express time column as DateTimeFieldSpec. Handled that in onboarding utils.
Release Notes
Upgrade Pinot version in TE to 0.4.0

nodes.bodyText: Can you shed some light into why we want to treat dateTimeFields as a dimension? what's the difference?

commit.message: Fix bug in time column name extraction
